mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_info (pi_name, pi_ci_seq, pi_sub, pi_price, pi_status, pi_cnt) VALUES (#{pi_name}, #{pi_ci_seq}, #{pi_sub}, #{pi_price}, #{pi_status}, #{pi_cnt});
mapper.select: select pi_seq, pi_ci_seq, pi_sub, pi_name, pi_price, pi_cnt, pi_status, ci_name as category_name from product_info a left outer join category_info b on a.pi_ci_seq = b.ci_seq where pi_seq = #{seq}
select ci_seq, ci_name from category_info where ci_name like #{keyword}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_info_history (pih_pi_seq, pih_type, pih_content) VALUES (#{pih_pi_seq}, #{pih_type}, #{pih_content});
mapper.select: select pi_seq from product_info order by pi_seq desc limit 1
select count(*) from product_info where pi_seq = #{seq}
